NZ First candidate, former police officer file Reserve Bank complaint against Kiwibank after losing $500,000 in scam https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz-first-candidate-former-police-officer-file-reserve-bank-complaint-against-kiwibank-after-losing-500k-in-scam/4IBC4SKA4VGBJGVPFZL4H4SEAU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz-first-candidate-former-police-officer-file-reserve-bank-complaint-against-kiwibank-after-losing-500k-in-scam/4IBC4SKA4VGBJGVPFZL4H4SEAU/ Lane NicholsThe victims claim Kiwibank failed to monitor the account or carry out due diligence. Mon, 13 May 2024 08:37:33 +0000 NZ First candidate David Wilson, who lost $200,000 in a scam, has complained to the Reserve Bank about Kiwibank harbouring an "active fraudulent" mule account used to launder stolen money. Photo / Michael Craig
